request.description: Import Banrisul bank statement CSV file(s). Supports multiple files.

formdata.description: Add multiple rows with key 'file' to import multiple files at once

request.description: Import Banrisul credit card statement PDF file(s).
Exports all transactions if no dates provided. Returns Excel with multiple sheets, charts, and KPIs.
